titleStmt.title: A trve and briefe relation of the bloody battel of Nievport in Flanders found betwixt Prince Mavrice of happy memory and Albert arch-duke of Avstria vpon the second of Iuly 1600
titleStmt.author: Hexham, Henry, 1585?-1650?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hexham by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
